body_html:
# coding: utf-8
import tensorflow as tf

var = tf.Variable(1)
assign_1 = var.assign(tf.multiply(var, 2))

with tf.control_dependencies([assign_1]):
    assign_2 = var.assign(tf.multiply(var, 2))

with tf.Session() as sess:
    sess.run(var.initializer)
    sess.run([assign_2])
    print(sess.run(var))        # = 4

# coding: utf-8
import tensorflow as tf

var = tf.Variable(1)
assign_1 = var.assign(tf.multiply(var, 2))

with tf.control_dependencies([assign_1]):
    assign_2 = var.assign(tf.multiply(var, 2))

with tf.Session() as sess:
    sess.run(var.initializer)
    sess.run([assign_2])
    print(sess.run(var))        # = 4
body:
```python
# coding: utf-8
import tensorflow as tf

var = tf.Variable(1)
assign_1 = var.assign(tf.multiply(var, 2))

with tf.control_dependencies([assign_1]):
    assign_2 = var.assign(tf.multiply(var, 2))

with tf.Session() as sess:
    sess.run(var.initializer)
    sess.run([assign_2])
    print(sess.run(var))        # = 4
```
